DescriptionData.Title: Improve Hunchback Back Stretcher, Multi-Level Back Stretching Device, Lower And Upper Back Pain Relief Massager Lumbar Support Waist Spine Pain Relax
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to AIWKR！ we will continue to update our products, thank you for your trust!

The Back Stretcher, Can Stretch Your Lumbar to Healthy Curve!

✔ Features:
◆ Easy installation.
◆ Gives your back fully stretch and support.
◆ Reduces nerve compression.
◆ Helps align your spinal back to healthy physical curve.
◆ It is portable that you can do stretching anywhere.

✔Specification:
◆ Material: ABS
◆Dimension: 25.5*38.5*16.8cm(10.04*15.16*6.61in)
◆ Package Content: 1* Home use back traction devices

✔Tips:
◆ Please allow measuring deviation due to manual measurement.
◆Due to shooting conditions, the colors may vary, please focus on the actual product color.
◆ If you have any questions or dissatisfaction with our products, you can send us an email at any time, We will serve you within 24 hours.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR BACK PAIN RELIEF: The ergonomic design can support comfortably the back, acupuncture therapy your back pain and discomfort, Improve muscle flexibility and stimulate blood circulation in back.

★PERFECT PORTABLE SOLUTION FOR ALL BACK PROBLEMS: Such as bulging disc, herniated disc and other lower back pain issues. This simply arched lumbar stretcher allows the spine to realign itself relieving spinal pressure.

★EASY INSTALLATION WITH 3 DIFFERENT LEVELS: The lumbar Back Stretcher with adjustable multi-level therapy device, it's flexible to adjust according to your different degree require, fully stretch and relieve pain in the lower back, shoulder and back muscles.

★MULTI PURPOSE: The lumbar alignment stretcher can be used whenever you are lying or sitting. The back alignment device can be placed on a chair to help correct your sitting posture, or car seat to serve as a lumbar support for car that helps reduce the tiredness especially.
★SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE: You can find more products you like by searching for AIWKR. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us. We will answer you within 24 hours.
